Address.Address1: Shk. Rashid Bin Saeed St / Rabdan St

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Novotel Abu Dhabi Al Bustan places you in the heart of Abu Dhabi, convenient to Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre and Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Mushrif Mall and Sheikh Zayed Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 361 guestrooms featuring MP3 docking stations and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have separate bathtubs and showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.


Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 361 guestrooms featuring MP3 docking stations and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have separate bathtubs and showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

A stay at Novotel Abu Dhabi Al Bustan places you in the heart of Abu Dhabi, convenient to Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre and Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Mushrif Mall and Sheikh Zayed Stadium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Mushrif Mall - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Sheikh Zayed Stadium - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Abu Dhabi Ice Rink - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Khalifa Park - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Higher Colleges of Technology-AbuDhabi - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Al Jazaeera Sports Club - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Red Crescent Authority - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Al Wahda Club - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Al Wahda Mall - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi
Shaikh Khalifa Medical City - 7.9 km / 4.9 mi
Abu Dhabi Mall - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Zayed City Market - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Khalifa Center - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Abu Dhabi (ZVJ-Abu Dhabi Bus Station) - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.) - 22 km / 13.7 mi

The preferred airport for Novotel Abu Dhabi Al Bustan is Abu Dhabi (AUH-Abu Dhabi Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
